definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: He searched for a lover for his wife after he became paralyzed, is he a wretch or a true man?
sentences.chinese: 癱瘓後，他爲他的妻子找情人，是窩囊廢還是純爺們？

sentences.english: No money, the somebody else scold you are wimps.
sentences.chinese: 沒有錢，人家罵你是窩囊廢。

sentences.english: Can you believe it? That pathetic loser stoled my story.
sentences.chinese: 你能想象嗎？那個可悲的窩囊廢偷用了我的故事。

sentences.english: He is really a worthless wretch.
Lino is the head of a dangerous family. There isn't room for wimps in this family.
sentences.chinese: 李諾是黑幫家族首腦，這家庭裏容不下窩囊廢。

sentences.english: Mike was the good-for-nothing son in Smith and Son Construction.
sentences.chinese: 邁克是史密斯與兒子建築公司裏阿誰窩囊廢兒子。

sentences.english: A flimflam man, matchstick man, loser.
sentences.chinese: 花言巧語的傢伙，火柴人，窩囊廢。
那就證明我是個窩囊廢。

sentences.english: A shame to let a joker like this win.
sentences.chinese: 讓這麼一個窩囊廢贏了真丟醜。

sentences.english: The man is absolutely a loser.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩是個徹頭徹尾的窩囊廢。

sentences.english: Ain't no way this wuss can keep you satisfied in bed, right?
sentences.chinese: 我看這個窩囊廢也沒法在牀上滿足你，是吧？
